title: Instead of eternals, sell us alternative dances at 500 RP
body:
[](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WWCXYshhOh4/WahhQvjNWUI/AAAAAAABEwc/l6qWEkgUuewd5FOsqKmOv43uBh5eQVD3wCLcBGAs/s1600/2c7b3de81ad5f9d2.png)

I think it would give more profit and the community would take it better.
######Season 16: Why doesn't Ivern have an alternative dance yet if Lux is already have 19?
